name: Free use of engineer adventurer (continuous update)
name_original: Free use of engineer adventurer (continuous update)
description:
In fact, I don't have much time to develop games so I decided to release them for free because I think developers will find them useful for prototyping or game blocking.

These are pixel art assets that can be used in graphic adventure games or sandbox games

This package is a rar file that contains a bunch of PNG images for sprites and animations:

EngineerAdventurer-1

-Start Run
-Run
-Finish Running

-Hammer-1

-Hammer-2

-Idle

-Jump

-Fall

------------------------------

IMPORTANT: With your financial permission, you can buy me a cup of coffee or You must properly attribute me in order to use my work legally. I will have more time to invest in updating and creating. Thank you for your support.
